name: Twisting Labyrinth
description:
Gather magical gems while avoiding ghouls and lava pits along the way. Use your wizard powers to rotate the walls and reposition to your advantage. Explore the endless procedurally-generated levels of the twisting labyrinth!

CONTROLS

  • WASD or Arrow Keys: move
  • Space: rotate walls

CREDITS

  • Kenney Game Assets

Made for the 2021 Kenney Jam (Theme: Rotation)
but unfortunately not submitted on time
